The Daily Show with Jon Stewart Presents Earth (The Book): A Visitor's Guide to the Human Race by Jon Stewart
Earth: Pleiadian Keys to the Living Library by Barbara Marciniak
The Good Earth by Pearl S. Buck
Earth Democracy: Justice, Sustainability and Peace by Vandana Shiva
Down to Earth Sociology: 14th Edition: Introductory Readings, Fourteenth Edition by James M. Henslin
Earth: Evolution of a Habitable World
Earth: Fourth Edition by Frank Press
The Solid Earth: An Introduction to Global Geophysics by C. M. R. Fowler
The EARTH Book by Todd Parr
The Wretched of the Earth by Frantz Fanon
